Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Author: Harper Lee
Summary: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Author: Jane Austen
Summary: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist Elizabeth Bennet.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Summary: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

Title: Moby Dick
Author: Herman Melville
Summary: A narrative of the adventures of the wandering sailor Ishmael and his voyage on the whaleship Pequod.

Title: War and Peace
Author: Leo Tolstoy
Summary: A novel that chronicles the history of the French invasion of Russia.
